reasoning: Multiple cold lead indicators: 'just browsing', 'not really sure', 'maybe next year', 'no hurry' keywords present. Budget (20L) falls in cold lead range (<25L). Timeline is distant (next year).

conversation_summary.sales_notes: Browsing stage, budget constraints, distant timeline

sample_conversation.content: Hi! Thanks for reaching out to GrowEasy Real Estate. I understand you're just browsing - that's absolutely fine! We're here to help you explore your options. To better assist you, I'd love to learn a bit more about what you're looking for. Let's start with location - which area or city are you interested in exploring?

Great! Delhi is a wonderful area. The market there has been quite active lately. What type of property are you interested in looking at? We deal with apartments, villas, plots, and commercial properties.
Perfect! Plot properties are in good demand. They're a great investment option in Delhi. Could you share your budget range in lakhs? This will help me identify suitable plots within your price point.

Thank you! A budget of â‚¹20 lakhs gives us good options to explore in Delhi. When are you planning to make your purchase? Are you looking to buy immediately, within 1-3 months, 3-6 months, or are you just exploring for now?
Thank you for your interest! I'll add you to our newsletter and keep you updated with new properties that match your criteria.
